full_summary:
### RCMP Operational Communication Center Efficiency Review

---

#### Tender Details

* **Procurement ID:** M298910460/A
* **Publication Date:** December 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 10, 2024 (17:00:00)
* **Contract Period:** Six months with optional two additional three-month periods

---

#### Service Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a review of its four (4) E Division Operational Communication Centers (OCCs) and Program Management Unit to determine workload and staffing requirements for efficient operation. The selected service provider will review current processes, develop recommendations, and present a comprehensive report to identify opportunities for improvement.

---

#### Security Requirements

The tender requires compliance with RCMP security regulations. Bidders are asked to review the full tender documentation for specific requirements.

---

#### Basis of Selection

Bidders will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

---

#### Submission Requirements

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit. The full tender documentation is available for download from [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Bidders are encouraged to regularly review this site for updates.

---

#### Post-Tender Engagement

The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any bidder on any procurement.

---

#### Indigenous Procurement

The RCMP is committed to supporting Indigenous businesses. Bidders are encouraged to visit the Indigenous Business Directory ([www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory)) to learn about the benefits of registering and the eligibility criteria.

---

#### Pricing and Payment Terms

The tender documents will outline the pricing structure and payment terms.

---

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact Gursharn Dhadwal at [gursharn.dhadwal@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:gursharn.dhadwal@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) or (778) 290-2774.

---

#### Attachments

Tender documents are available for download from CanadaBuys. Bidders are required to submit their proposals in either English or French.
